title: Nothing UI Newtab
description: There's a good project called Material You New Tab which is basically a NewTab extension for chromium, it was good but not followed my liking. So impressed by newly brought Nothing Phone's UI known as NOTHING UI I made something my own.
features: Add, edit, and remove website links as desired.
Include a macOS-like dock for apps to enhance accessibility.
Display real-time weather information using the OpenWeatherMap API.
Toggle unwanted features such as docs, app drawer, AI tools, and more.
Add, edit, or remove search engines and AI tools with ease.
Adjust the wallpaper-changing interval for widgets.
Choose between monochrome or colorful icons for a personalized look.
Set custom icons for each saved website link.
Switch between digital and analog clock faces.
Toggle blur and monochrome effects for images.
Switch between Fahrenheit and Celsius temperature scales.
Toggle location name visibility for privacy.
Import and export data as JSON files.
Switch between light and dark themes for optimal viewing.

highlights.title: Sleek UI & UX
highlights.description: Built with Tailwind CSS, Framer motion, radix ui primitives & headless which offers fast & fluid experience.

highlights.title: Secured Data
highlights.description: Your data is not stored anywhere except your browser, you have 100% freedom what you do with it. Keep or delete.

highlights.title: TypeScript & Maintainability
highlights.description: Written in TypeScript, Zustand, and Tailwind utilities for enhanced maintainability and developer experience.

highlights.title: Open Source
highlights.description: This project is open source under AGPL-3.0 license, do whatever you want with it but keep it open source.
